remarks: The quotient of two complex numbers is one iff they are equal. Deduction form of ~ diveq1 .  Generalization of ~ diveq1d . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divcld.3 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
diveq1ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) = 1 <-> A = B ) ) $.
